docs.text:
Overview


Finvu has implemented a FIP simulator based on the 
ReBIT API specs
 in order to test the APIs as part of the AA ecosystem. We have also provided an API for inputting source FI data considering different 
FIType
 and these would evolve as we move forward. Kindly refer to the details of the FIP Data API to know more. 


Since this is a closed user group the FIP simulator has support for 
http
 only and future support for 
https
 will be considered.


We are trying to keep upto the pace by implementing latest Rebit API specs for the FIP simulator, however if there any issues, do drop us a note at 
info@cookiejar.co.in


Version


Currently the FIP simulator adheres to the ReBit specs version 1.0.5


FIP Data Entry API


Prior to using the FIP Sandbox API, dummy FI data can be entered into FIP source data system using the 
FIP Data API


AA Data API


Prior to using the AA Sandbox API, dummy FI data can be entered into AA source data system using the 
AA Data API


API Key Request


In order to use the FIP and AA API an api key is required to be passed. 


Please send an email to 
info@cookiejar.co.in
 for the api key. 


Refer to the 
FIP API Sandbox
 page for more information.


Refer to the 
AA API Sandbox
 page for more information.


Root API Endpoint


The root API end point is 
http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/

docs.text:
FIP API


This is a simulator implementation of the FIP API and can be used for testing the Account Aggregator flows as part of the ecosystem. 


API Request


The API URL to be used is 
<Root API Endpoint>/<FIP API>
 as per ReBIT FIP API Specs.

docs.title: FIP API Sandbox

docs.text: This is a simulator implementation of the FIP API and can be used for testing the Account Aggregator flows as part of the ecosystem.
docs.title: FIP API

docs.text: The API URL to be used is  <Root API Endpoint>/<FIP API>  as per ReBIT FIP API Specs.
docs.title: API Request

docs.text: HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/discover
docs.title: Account Discover
Request headers

docs.text: For simulation purpose, the customer account authentication is TOKEN based and an OTP is sent to the mobile no of the account holder.   HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/link
docs.title: Account Linking
Request headers

docs.text: For simulation purpose, The method is used to delete a previously established account linkage to the user’s profile.   HTTP METHOD:  DELETE  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/link
docs.title: Account Unlinking
Request headers

docs.text: HTTP METHOD:  GET  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/link/{RefNumber}/{Token}  e.g. : http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/link/f455409f-6d06-4c8a-ac5a-34c6d78d467a/939504
docs.title: Account Confirm Token
Request headers

docs.text: HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/FI/request
docs.title: FI request
Request headers

docs.text:
HTTP METHOD:  GET  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/FI/fetch/{SessionID} 
e.g. : http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/FI/fetch/931d1d33-e332-4ee2-b780-020d43ba69fd

Request headers

Request headers

docs.title: Heartbeat

FIP Data API


This API can be used to add sample data for accounts and associated transactions and can be called from an appropriate testing tool such as 
Postman

POST

AA API Sandbox


This is a Sandbox implementation of the AA API and can be used for testing the Account Aggregator flows as part of the ecosystem. 


API Request


The API URL to be used is 
<Root API Endpoint>/<FIP API>
 as per ReBIT AA API Specs.

docs.title: AA API Sandbox

docs.text: This is a Sandbox implementation of the AA API and can be used for testing the Account Aggregator flows as part of the ecosystem.
docs.title: AA API Sandbox

docs.text: The API URL to be used is  <Root API Endpoint>/<FIP API>  as per ReBIT AA API Specs.
docs.title: API Request

docs.text: This API is intended for AA Client to request generation of digitally signed consent artefacts.  HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consent
docs.title: Consents
Request headers

docs.text: This API is intended for checking the status of a previously submitted Consent Artefacts creation request  HTTP METHOD:  GET  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consent/handle/{consentHandle}  e.g. : http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consent/handle/2c75ad41-49e0-438c-bd7c-8af9db072065
docs.title: /Consent/handle/{consentHandle}
Request headers

docs.text:
This API is intended for fetching the information associated with the specific consent.  HTTP METHOD:  GET  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consent/{id} 
e.g. : http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consent/79072af5-c41f-4cae-ac59-e233b82ea750
docs.title: Consents/{id}
Request headers

docs.text: The FIU or the User submits the Consent IDs of the consents required for fetching financial information from the FIP(s).  HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/FI/request
docs.title: /FI/request
Request headers

docs.text:
Once FIU receives the notification   from AA, using digitally signed consent request received from AA, this API can be used to fetch the financial information from the AA.  HTTP METHOD:  GET  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/FI/fetch/{sessionId} 
e.g. : http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/FI/fetch/e4e3fb59-d682-48c7-80e2-770967ba2477
